data.title: Bitcoin is an ‘asset of fear,’ says BlackRock CEO Larry Fink
data.description: Larry Fink called Bitcoin "an asset of fear" at the December 3 DealBook Summit. The BlackRock CEO said people own Bitcoin because they’re “frightened” of debasement. BlackRock holds around $80 billion in its Bitcoin exchange-traded fund.
data.keywords: Larry Fink, BlackRock, Bitcoin ETF, Bitcoin worth, Bitcoin
